attributes.action: Ensure that the police pay award for 2007 is back dated to 1st September 2007 Just like in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretary showing utter contempt for rank and file officers has effectively ignored the arbitration process and effectively given us a 1.9% award. Where as in Scotland they will get the full 2.5% as it will be back dated. Why are the rest of us in England and Wales treated with contempt

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
